topic_or_construct: ADHD & DBD related behavior problems (Attention, Aggressive, Rule-breaking)
measured_by: Youth Self Report (YSR) subscales: YSR_AT, YSR_AG, YSR_RBB
justification: The Youth Self Report (YSR) questionnaire is used, focusing on subscales measuring attention, aggressive behavior, and rule-breaking, these subscales serve as proxies for impulsivity-related behaviors correlated with ADHD and Disruptive Behavior Disorders (DBD).
